#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

void FindPosition( vector< vector<int> >& A, int val, int n ) {
	
	int i, j;
	
	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
		for( j = 0;j < n;j++ )
			if( A[ i ][ j ] == val ) {
				
				printf("%d %d\n", ( i + 1 ), ( j + 1 ) );
				return;
			}
	
	printf("-1\n");
}

int main() {
	
	int t, n, q, i, j, val;
	
	scanf("%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d %d", &n, &q );
		vector< vector<int> > A( n, vector<int> ( n ) );
		
		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
			for( j = 0;j < n;j++ )
				scanf("%d", &A[ i ][ j ] );
		
		while( q-- ) {
			
			scanf("%d", &val );
			FindPosition( A, val, n );
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
